oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Merle Travis Fact Sheet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Offset printing; Travis, Merle;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white negatives taped to a piece of masking sheet advertising facts about Merle Travis, including his birthplace; major songs recorded; major albums recorded; major songs written; movies, radio, and television shows he appeared on; record label; countries; and hobbies. A strip of negative containing additional songs recorded is missing. The negatives would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:accessRights: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
